meanings.definition: One of the small, polished plane surfaces of a cut gem.
meanings.sent1: The diamond sparkled as light reflected off its smooth facet.
meanings.sent2: She admired the emerald's brilliant facet as it caught the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook a shiny facet of glass for a precious gem.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a multifaceted gem, each facet revealing a different emotion.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler carefully examined each facet of the diamond for imperfections.

meanings.definition: One of the aspects or features of a subject or situation.
meanings.sent1: The financial facet of the project required careful planning.
meanings.sent2: Exploring every facet of the issue helped them find a solution.
meanings.sent3: In the facet of time management, he was a true master.
meanings.sent4: The facet of teamwork shone brightly in their successful collaboration.
meanings.sent5: Each facet of her personality added depth to her character.
